name: Stay Nimble
slogan: Stay Nimble is a social enterprise providing a digital career coaching service
description:
We are helping millions of people to “count themselves in” to new types of work that are being created in their local economies.

Workers can succeed in navigating this period of rapid change if they:

• can easily see what is changing in their local economies;
• know their core strengths and how these can be directed to new tasks;
• understand how to keep themselves mobile between the types of work being created.

Stay Nimble is the essential tool this new labour market can use to effectively manage this continual reinvention of our working identities.

By digitising career coaching, we provide individuals with data about work in their local economy, and using proprietary algorithms, matches their natural aptitudes to new types of work.

We partner with accredited training providers to help individuals direct these aptitudes towards skills needed in the new economy, reducing the time to change into entirely new jobs by 6 months.

We are the Headspace for Career Wellbeing.

team.name: Dominic Atkinson
team.bioHtml: I've spent the last two decades leading organisations, coaching individuals and building software applications to make business better. Fellow of the RSA.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Senior Product Designer to create beautiful and simple user experiences for our customers. You will work closely with our Product Director,  combining user research with your creativity to deliver features that create value for customers.
We work in Design Sprints, testing bi-weekly with our customers to validate our ideas - you will work closely with one of the Stay Nimble Product Managers to deliver these sprints.
 
You will thrive in this role if you are an experienced analytical and creative designer who is able to grasp complex user needs and design simple solutions that create value for our members. A strong portfolio of successful consumer facing digital projects is essential.  

**Responsibilities**
* Lead our design function, mentoring/coaching other members of the design team and setting our design standards, bringing the Stay Nimble Brand to to the fore of design work 
* Create personas through user research, using data analytics and behavioural psychology
* Conduct design sprints to prove ideas in product discovery
* Work with the team to define feature specifications
* Conduct concept and value/usability testing and gather feedback
* Define the right product interactions and evaluate feature success
* Develop wireframes and  prototypes around customer needs
* Find creative ways to solve UX problems (e.g. value, usability, findability)
* Use your graphic & interaction design skills to implement attractive designs
* Work collaboratively with the development team to enable validated designs to be delivered into a high quality live product. 
* Be aware of competitor products and industry trends

**Skills And Experience **
*Must Have*
* 6+ years experience as a UX-UI Designer, demonstrating experience with end-to-end product design. 
* Strong portfolio of design projects/products 
* Strong UI skills (graphic & visual design) with an ability to develop high fidelity prototypes
* Strong core UX skills - user research/needs analysis, idea generation, creating user flows, wireframing, lo-fi/hi-fi prototyping
* Proficient using design software (e.g. Sketch, Marvel, Invision, Zeplin, Adobe Suite)
* Strong problem solving ability and able to work at speed, comfortable making decisions in uncertain conditions.
* An analytical mind with sound business acumen
* Excellent communication skills and ability to empathise with customers 
 
***Nice to have ***
* Knowledge of frontend programming (HTML/CSS; JavaScript) is a plus
* Experience copy writing, bringing brand voice to design work
* Experience managing projects **
